EmailTemplate.name: Follow Up from MBO (1348850474.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow Up from MBO (1348850474.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Daniel, Thank you for reaching out! I do see your prior account with MBO. I would like to take a few minutes to speak with you about your new work with Logan and give you a little refresher on the MBO Business Model, and what steps need to be taken to get you re-activated with MBO. You may easily schedule a time to speak with me on my online schedule <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeENYvEBW4v%2BLb7nsjSHOf4q79b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> or give me a call later this afternoon if that is convenient for you. I have gone ahead and updated the primary email address on your account to this address so the record is current. I look forward to speaking with you soon! Thank you,Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> If you are in the DC area please check out our upcoming networking event! <http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e6cqaqtk0702919f&llr=kp5x6qkab> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
